title: (Recruitment) Currently searching for Jungler Gold + for Competitive Flex
body:
**Age of Innocence (AOI17) is currently seeking a gold+ Assassin play style jungler that is wanting to join a ranked flex team. You must be consistently active and have the desire to improve alongside the team. You must also be willing to take constructive critism and possess a positive mindset. We are wanting to go competitive after we reach platinum tier for ranked flex. If you are interested, add me and swing me a message:**

**IGN:**

_**RazorRenegade**_
